desc: The American Candle was created as a way Patriots can conveniently support the policies of Donald J. Trump from the convenience of their own homes. Buy the American Candle today!

layout.text:
The American Candle was created as a way Patriots can conveniently support conservative principals from their very home.
We are proud that each and every candle is hand poured in the United States of America. Keep the freedom fire burning with our high quality products.
Serving Patriot's throughout the country with the finest candles in addition to contributing to conservative ideals is our founding principal.
